body_html:
--memory=8g let it go up to notMNIST_large/D... then it went back down to notMNIST_large/C with 12GB before it crashed with the same OSError: [Errno 12] Cannot allocate memory.

Meanwhile the usage stats of the container (docker stats udacity_deep_learning) show that it's nowhere near the limit (the most it went up to before crashing was about 1.5GB)

CONTAINER               CPU %               MEM USAGE / LIMIT     MEM %               NET I/O               BLOCK I/O
udacity_deep_learning   0.01%               1.402 GB / 12.88 GB   10.88%              256.3 MB / 657.9 kB   733.4 MB / 237.6 kB

Thank you for your help!

Meanwhile the usage stats of the container (docker stats udacity_deep_learning) show that it's nowhere near the limit (the most it went up to before crashing was about 1.5GB)

body:
`--memory=8g` let it go up to `notMNIST_large/D`... then it went back down to `notMNIST_large/C` with 12GB before it crashed with the same `OSError: [Errno 12] Cannot allocate memory`.

Meanwhile the usage stats of the container (`docker stats udacity_deep_learning`) show that it's nowhere near the limit (the most it went up to before crashing was about 1.5GB)

```
CONTAINER               CPU %               MEM USAGE / LIMIT     MEM %               NET I/O               BLOCK I/O
udacity_deep_learning   0.01%               1.402 GB / 12.88 GB   10.88%              256.3 MB / 657.9 kB   733.4 MB / 237.6 kB
```

Thank you for your help!
